questions.quote: Oh, Elaine.Â  Yeah, well, things just didn't work out like I thought they would.
Hey Elaine if a guy wanted to end a relationship with you . What could he do?
Wha-- oh!  Oh, god!  That is the THIRD time today I have done that! BLAAAH!  Grabbing news- papers... I'm just tugging at 'em...
Quite a dilemma. You know, I have a bit of a dilemma of my own.
Yeah, yeah, the flower guy. Listen, I know this all sounds a little crazy, but...
Well, those aren't for New Year's. Those are my everyday balloons.
Oh yeah, I've been known to drink a beer or two. But then again, I've been known to do a lot of things.  Cigarette?
So as a result of your test being free of opium, I am reinstating you.
Who's got a tissues? I need more tissues! Look at this thing. It's my phone finger!
I didn't know you meant *hold* it, I thought you meant hold it.
